options.optionText: I've got your mutant heads. Still squishy.
options.responseText: Sweet nuclear Christ. Look at that sack of stinking glory... You really outdid yourself—smells like victory and rotting flesh. General Grim’s gonna nut patriotic tears when he sees this.

followUpOptions.optionText: So... can I join the Enclave now?
followUpOptions.responseText: Aww, look at you. Covered in guts and thinkin' you're one of us now? Hate to break your tiny, irradiated heart, but hauling mutant skulls don’t make you Enclave. I don’t hand out passwords like candy, and I sure as fuck don’t recruit vault-born jackoffs who think loyalty means a headcount. You want in? Go crawl up Grim’s ass and pray he coughs up a badge. Until then, you’re just another errand bitch with delusions of relevance.
Right. Caps and a clean kill record in our files. You’ve earned it — don’t blow it all on chems and whores.

options.optionText: Special delivery from the Capital Brotherhood—for your brave General Grim.
options.onlyDisplayIfHasObjective: Deliver the Special Cake to Enclave
options.markObjectiveComplete: Deliver the Special Cake to Enclave
options.responseText: Well, fuck me sideways—a peace offering from those tin-can dipshits? Didn't peg those Brotherhood morons for bakers. Guess we'll see if Archie likes frosting as much as tap dancing. Thanks, courier—feel free to piss off now.

options.optionText: I helped one of your guys clear out Vault 6969. He sends his regards—and about a hundred heads on pikes.
options.responseText: So you're one of the sick bastards behind that glorious bloodbath? You've earned yourself a personal suite—and hell, throw in one of our purest daughters as a wife. But I still need a password before I let you through.

followUpOptions.responseText: Well, holy shit, you got it. Welcome to the clubhouse—don't fuck it up.

options.optionText: Who the hell are you supposed to be?
options.responseText: I'M YOUR FAIRY FUCKING GODMOTHER—HERE TO GRANT YOU THREE WISHES: A BULLET, A BOOT UP THE ASS, OR A GUIDED TOUR THROUGH HELL. Oh, and I’m also Enclave, here to scrape worthless shits like you off the boots of America. But you probably guessed that already. IF I SEE YOU TWITCH THE WRONG WAY, I'LL RIP YOUR SKULL OPEN AND PISS ON WHAT'S LEFT OF YOUR BRAIN.

followUpOptions.responseText: Exploring? THIS ISN'T A FUCKING AMUSEMENT PARK. Every mutant, raider, or wasteland vermin we've encountered ends up strung up, gutted, and displayed as a warning. You see those rotten carcasses? THAT'S OUR WELCOME SIGN. Make one wrong move, and you'll join our little roadside exhibit.

followUpOptions.optionText: What makes you think you're special?
followUpOptions.responseText: Special? Nah, we're just regular folks with great dental care, a nuclear arsenal, and pristine genetics—pure-blood descendants of those who laughed while your ancestors melted into screaming puddles of goo. We're here to continue the tradition—by reducing shit-stains like you INTO ASHES.

followUpOptions.optionText: Sounds like you're all just genocidal maniacs.
followUpOptions.responseText: Genocidal? Nah. WE'RE ARTISTS. The masterpiece is a purified America, free from mutant trash. I'd flay you alive right now and decorate our perimeter with your intestines as proof of our dedication. HUMANITY'S REBIRTH DEMANDS YOUR BRUTAL EXTINCTION.

Join? HA, THAT'S FUCKING RICH. Still, if you've got the stomach to skin mutants alive and dance knee-deep in their blood... MAYBE WE'D LET YOU SERVE AS CANNON FODDER. But first, what's our fucking PASSWORD?
Cute. BUT WRONG. Guess again, shit-for-brains, or fuck off.
I appreciate the sentiment, but THAT AIN'T IT. Come back when your head’s less irradiated.
Funny guy, huh? Say another word and you'll find out how your teeth taste.

followUpOptions.optionText: So, what's someone like you do for fun around here?
followUpOptions.responseText: When I'm not stringing mutants up by their entrails? Oh, you know—target practice on live raiders, poker games with my buddies, or maybe just a casual night torturing captured Brotherhood scouts. Real good stuff.

That would be General Archibald 'Archie' Grim. Brilliant strategist, total psychopath, and surprisingly skilled dancer. You haven't truly feared a man until you've watched him shuffle-step over mutant corpses while humming tunes.

options.responseText: THIS IS OUR FUCKING FORTRESS—the place where we’ll reignite America by napalming every radioactive abomination into screaming oblivion. Stick around, and your screams will echo nicely in our torture chambers!

Always got room for eager psychopaths. Bring me the heads of five mutants—freshly severed preferred, not that freeze-dried shit—and you'll get a payout generous enough to make your mama proud. Assuming she's alive. Probably isn't, knowing your kind.

followUpOptions.responseText: That’s the spirit! Now go spread some post-apocalyptic decapitation cheer.
Figures. Soft as brahmin shit. Go join the Brotherhood—maybe they'll give you a medal for not pissing yourself.

options.responseText: Run back to your pit, coward. Next time we meet, I'll carve your cowardly spine out and mount it on our gates.

random_auto_line: I was hoping something would wander in today. My rifle's been bored.
